ROOT.GetAcLineTower: SELECT r.tower_id,r.towerno,r.towername,d.province_owner,d.province,d.city_owner,d.city,d.district_owner,d.district FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_district d on r.line_id=d.line_id and r.tower_id=d.tower_id where r.line_id={0}
ROOT.GetDcLineTower: SELECT r.tower_id,r.towerno,r.towername,d.province_owner,d.province,d.city_owner,d.city,d.district_owner,d.district FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower r left join same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_district d on r.line_id=d.line_id and r.tower_id=d.tower_id where r.line_id={0}
ROOT.GetAllEffectList: SELECT alarm_time,alarm_line,alarm_tower,distence FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_2022 where DISTENCE<3000 AND ALARM_TIME>={0} and ALARM_TIME<{1} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT line_id,is_forecast,date_time FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower where date_time>={0} and date_time<{1} UNION ALL select id,0,warntime,warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_station select id,1,warntime,warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_station_forecast select * from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower select * from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower_forecast
ROOT.A: select count(1) from ( select distinct a.date_time,a.line_id,a.tower_id_start,l.lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning l JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower a on l.affect_obj_id=a.line_id where affect_type=2 and lightning_time>2 ) tt
ROOT.GetEffectLine: SELECT 'fire' as envtype,'' as alarm_time,a.alarm_line,a.alarm_tower as st_tower,'','' as et_tower,'', a.ALARM_LEVEL as value,0 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 a where ALARM_TIME>={0} and ALARM_TIME<{1} AND alarm_line IS NOT NULL and alarm_line<>'' UNION ALL select 'light','',line_id,alarm_tower,'','','',alarm_level,0 from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGLIVE_2022 a where a.date_time>={0} and a.date_time<{1} AND LINE_ID IS NOT NULL and LINE_ID<>'' UNION ALL select warntype,'', lineid, '','','','',warnlevel||'',count(id) as c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a where a.warntime>={0} and a.warntime<{1} group by lineid, warntype, warnlevel
ROOT.GetEffectLine2: SELECT 'fire' as envtype,'' as alarm_time,a.alarm_line,a.alarm_tower as st_tower,'' as st_towerno,'' as et_tower,'' as et_tower_no, a.distence as value,0 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_2022 a where ALARM_TIME>=TO_DATE ('2020-08-24 00:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and ALARM_TIME<TO_DATE ('2020-08-24 17:01:10', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND DISTENCE<3000 UNION ALL select 'light','',line_id,tower_id_start,'',tower_id_end,'',lightning_time,0 from ( select distinct a.date_time,a.line_id,a.tower_id_start,a.tower_id_end,l.lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning l JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower a on l.affect_obj_id=a.line_id and a.date_time>=l.start_time and a.date_time<=l.end_time where l.affect_type=2 and l.lightning_time>2 and a.date_time>=TO_DATE ('2020-08-24 00:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.date_time<TO_DATE ('2020-08-24 17:01:10', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) UNION ALL select warntype, '', lineid, '','','','',warnlevel,count(id) as c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a where a.warntime>='2020-08-24 00:00:00' and a.warntime<'2020-08-24 17:01:10' group by lineid, warntype, warnlevel
ROOT.GetEffectLine1: /* SELECT 'icing',a.date_time,a.line_id,a.st_tower_id,r1.towerno,a.end_tower_id,r2.towerno,a.icing_thickness FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_h_icinglive_2018 a LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r1 on a.line_id=r1.line_id and a.st_tower_id=r1.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r2 on a.line_id=r2.line_id and a.end_tower_id=r2.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r3 on a.line_id=r3.line_id and a.st_tower_id=r3.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r4 on a.line_id=r4.line_id and a.end_tower_id=r4.tower_id where icing_thickness>=2.0 AND date_time>={0} AND date_time<{1} UNION ALL */ SELECT 'fire' as envtype,'' as alarm_time,a.alarm_line,a.alarm_tower as st_tower,'' as st_towerno,'' as et_tower,'' as et_tower_no, a.distence as value,0 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_2022 a where ALARM_TIME>={0} and ALARM_TIME<{1} AND DISTENCE<3000 UNION ALL select 'light','',line_id,tower_id_start,'',tower_id_end,'',lightning_time,0 from ( select distinct a.date_time,a.line_id,a.tower_id_start,a.tower_id_end,l.lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning l JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower a on l.affect_obj_id=a.line_id and a.date_time>=l.start_time and a.date_time<=l.end_time where l.affect_type=2 and l.lightning_time>2 and a.date_time>={0} and a.date_time<{1} ) UNION ALL select warntype, '', lineid, '','','','',warnlevel,count(id) as c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a where a.warntime>={0} and a.warntime<{1} group by lineid, warntype, warnlevel
ROOT.GetEffectLineFore: SELECT 'fire' as envtype,'' as alarm_time,a.alarm_line,a.alarm_tower as st_tower,'','' as et_tower,'', a.ALARM_LEVEL as value,0 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNamesg_com_mountain_h_FIREFORECAST_2022 a where ALARM_TIME>={0} and ALARM_TIME<{1} AND alarm_line IS NOT NULL and alarm_line<>'' UNION ALL select 'light','',line_id,alarm_tower,'','','',alarm_level,0 from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_H_LIGHTNINGWARN_2022 a where a.date_time>={0} and a.date_time<{1} AND LINE_ID IS NOT NULL and LINE_ID<>'' UNION ALL select warntype, '', lineid, '','','','',warnlevel||'',count(id) as c from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower_forecast a where a.warntime>={0} and a.warntime<{1} group by lineid, warntype, warnlevel
ROOT.GetEffectLineTower: /* SELECT 'icing',a.date_time,a.line_id,a.st_tower_id,r1.towerno,a.end_tower_id,r2.towerno,a.icing_thickness FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_h_icinglive_2018 a LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r1 on a.line_id=r1.line_id and a.st_tower_id=r1.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r2 on a.line_id=r2.line_id and a.end_tower_id=r2.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r3 on a.line_id=r3.line_id and a.st_tower_id=r3.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r4 on a.line_id=r4.line_id and a.end_tower_id=r4.tower_id where icing_thickness>=2.0 AND date_time>={0} AND date_time<{1} UNION ALL */ SELECT 'fire' as envtype,a.alarm_time,a.alarm_line,a.alarm_tower as st_tower,nvl(r1.towerno,r2.towerno) as st_towerno,'' as et_tower,'' as et_tower_no, a.distence as value FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_com_mountain_h_firealarm_2022 a LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r1 on a.alarm_line=r1.line_id and a.alarm_tower=r1.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower r2 on a.alarm_line=r2.line_id and a.alarm_tower=r2.tower_id where ALARM_TIME>={0} and ALARM_TIME<{1} AND DISTENCE<3000 UNION ALL select distinct 'light', a.date_time,a.line_id,a.tower_id_start,nvl(r1.towerno,r2.towerno),'','',l.lightning_time from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning l JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_lightning_tower a on l.affect_obj_id=a.line_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r1 on a.line_id=r1.line_id and a.tower_id_start=r1.tower_id LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower r2 on a.line_id=r2.line_id and a.tower_id_start=r2.tower_id where l.affect_type=2 and l.lightning_time>2 and a.date_time>={0} and a.date_time<{1} UNION ALL select a.warntype,a.warntime,a.lineid,a.id,a.num as tno,'','',a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a where a.warntime>={0} and a.warntime<{1}
ROOT.GetAcLineTowerT: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntype='temperature' and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetDcLineTowerT: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntype='temperature' and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetAcLineTowerW: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntype='wind' and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetDcLineTowerW: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntype='wind' and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetAcLineTowerR: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntype='rain' and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetDcLineTowerR: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntype='rain' and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetAcLineTowerWeather: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel,a.warntype from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_acline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetDcLineTowerWeather: select a.id,a.warntime,t.longitude,t.latitude,a.warnlevel,a.warntype from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_alarm_weather_tower a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dcline_r_tower r on a.id=r.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.id=t.id where r.line_id={0} and warntime>={1} AND warntime<{2}
ROOT.GetLineAcross: SELECT min_tower_id,max_tower_id,across_type,ACROSS_OBJ_ID,O.NAME,across_longitude,across_latitude AS across_name ,across_longitude as longitude,across_latitude as latitude,A.ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT 2 as TYPE,id||'' AS ID,name AS NAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_highway_info UNION ALL SELECT 3,ID||'',NAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_railway_info UNION ALL SELECT 1,A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID,'' FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_tower_across_info A WHERE A.ACROSS_TYPE=1 AND A.LINE_ID={0} ) O ON A.ACROSS_TYPE=O.TYPE AND A.ACROSS_OBJ_ID=O.ID WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} same:if3k
ROOT.GetLineAcross0: SELECT min_tower_id,max_tower_id,across_type,ACROSS_OBJ_ID,'' AS NAME,across_longitude,across_latitude AS across_name ,across_longitude as longitude,across_latitude as latitude,A.ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO A WHERE A.LINE_ID={0} same:if3k
ROOT.GetAcLineTower_Qiqu: select a.START_TOWER_ID,a.END_TOWER_ID,a.record_time,t.longitude,t.latitude from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_HANDLE_INFO a left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_tower_b t on a.START_TOWER_ID=t.id where a.type={1} AND a.lineid={0}
